item.title: Your DR Plan Has Never Been Tested
item.description: Most Azure DR tests confirm the secondary came up. They don’t confirm your RTO is real, your RPO commitment holds under load, or that failback won’t silently destroy the incident window. Here’s how to test DR honestly, with exit criteria that actually prove the plan works.
